en: The democrat endeavored to accomplish his aim by himself.
zh: 民主党人努力独自实现他的目标。

en: The widow had to get through a lot of hardships.
zh: 这位寡妇不得不经历许多艰难困苦。

en: The widow was dressed in black.
zh: 这位寡妇身穿黑色衣服。

en: The widow suffered from stomach cancer.
zh: 这位寡妇患有胃癌。

en: The translation was true to the original.
zh: 这个翻译忠实于原文。

en: The skyscraper rose above the other buildings around.
zh: 那座摩天大楼高耸于周围的其他建筑物之上。

en: The translation is quite true to the original.
zh: 这个翻译非常忠实于原文。

en: The translation is true to the original.
zh: 这个翻译忠实于原文。

en: The translation was nicely true to the original.
zh: 这个翻译非常忠实于原文。

en: The bookshelf is built in.
zh: 这个书架是嵌入式的。

en: Did you read the whole book?
zh: 你把整本书都读完了吗？

en: Please send the book by mail.
zh: 请把这本书邮寄过来。

en: I'll send the book by mail.
zh: 我会把这本书邮寄过去。

en: I must get the book back from him.
zh: 我一定要从他那里把书要回来。

en: I got the book back from him.
zh: 我从他那里把书要回来了。

en: I wanted to buy the book, but I found I had no more than 200 yen with me.
zh: 我想买这本书，但我发现我身上只有不到200日元。

en: I tried to read through the book, which I found impossible.
zh: 我试图读完这本书，但我发现这是不可能的。

en: I got a lot out of that book I read.
zh: 我从读的那本书里学到了很多东西。

en: It was not until I read the book that I knew about it.
zh: 直到我读了这本书，我才知道这件事。

en: Give me back the book after you have read it.
zh: 读完这本书后，请把书还给我。

en: You've read through the book, haven't you?
zh: 你已经读完这本书了吧？

en: While reading the book, I felt asleep.
zh: 读书的时候，我睡着了。

en: Few people seem to have read the book.
zh: 似乎很少有人读过这本书。

en: Having read the book, I could answer all the questions.
zh: 读完这本书后，我能回答所有的问题。

en: I remember reading the book.
zh: 我记得读过这本书。

en: When you're done with the book, put it back where you found it.
zh: 你看完这本书后，把它放回你找到它的地方。

en: I felt the richer for having read the book.
zh: 读完这本书后，我觉得自己更充实了。

en: I found a new meaning whenever I read the book.
zh: 每次读这本书，我都能发现新的意义。

en: I cannot find time to read the book.
zh: 我找不到时间读书。

en: It won't take long to read that book.
zh: 读那本书不需要很长时间。

en: You need a large vocabulary to read that book.
zh: 你需要大量的词汇才能读懂那本书。

en: No one can read the book without crying.
zh: 没有人能不哭着读完这本书。

en: Put the book back on the shelf when you're through with it.
zh: 看完这本书后，把它放回书架上。

en: Please return the book when you have finished reading it.
zh: 读完这本书后，请归还。

en: If you have finished reading the book, return it to the library.
zh: 如果你读完这本书了，就把它还给图书馆。

en: Give the book back to me when you are done with it.
zh: 你读完这本书后，把它还给我。

en: Please lend me the book when you have finished reading it.
zh: 你读完这本书后，请借给我看看。

en: I've finished reading the book.
zh: 我已经读完这本书了。

en: Please read that book.
zh: 请读那本书。

en: Didn't you read the book?
zh: 你没读过这本书吗？

en: Hand me that book, please.
zh: 请把那本书递给我。

en: Did you order the book?
zh: 你订购那本书了吗？

en: Give the book to whomever wants it.
zh: 把这本书给任何想要它的人。

en: Put the book back on the shelf.
zh: 把书放回书架上。

en: Take down the book from the shelf.
zh: 从书架上取下那本书。

en: Did you take the book back to the library?
zh: 你把书还回图书馆了吗？

en: I remember returning the book to the library.
zh: 我记得把书还给图书馆了。

en: I'd like to place an order for the book with the publishing company.
zh: 我想向出版社订购这本书。

en: You may take the book.
zh: 你可以拿走这本书。

en: Is it possible to buy the book at the bookstore in Akita?
zh: 可以在秋田的书店买到这本书吗？

en: Put the book back in the same place where you found it.
zh: 把书放回你找到它的地方。

en: There is no hurry about returning the book to me.
zh: 不用着急把书还给我。

en: Give the book back to the owner.
zh: 把书还给书的主人。

en: Put the book on the desk.
zh: 把书放在桌子上。

en: Read the book again and again.
zh: 反复阅读这本书。

en: You may borrow this book as long as you keep it clean.
zh: 只要你保持这本书的清洁，你就可以借阅。

en: Put the book back where it was.
zh: 把书放回原来的地方。

en: Put the book where you found it.
zh: 把书放回你找到它的地方。

en: Have you finished reading the book?
zh: 你读完这本书了吗？
